name: Introduction to Media Studies
description: This course will provide an overview of the field of Media Studies. It will cover topics such as media history, media theory, contemporary media, and media literacy.

name: Principles of Advertising
description: This course provides an overview of the principles of advertising, including the history and development of the field, theories of advertising, and current advertising trends.

name: Advertising Strategies
description: This course examines the strategic aspects of advertising, including the development of marketing plans, budgeting, and other strategic considerations.

name: Advertising Creative
description: This course examines the creative aspects of advertising, including the development of promotional campaigns, creative development, and other creative considerations.

name: Advertising and Consumer Behavior
description: This course will explore the various aspects of how media affects consumer behavior. It will cover topics such as advertising strategy, digital marketing, and consumer psychology.

name: Advertising Research and Analysis
description: This course will introduce students to the basics of advertising research and analysis. It will cover topics such as market segmentation, media metrics, and consumer profiling.

name: Advertising Management
description: This course will provide an in-depth look at the management of advertising campaigns. It will cover topics such as budgeting, ad placement, and campaign evaluation.

name: Advanced Advertising Strategies
description: This course examines the more advanced strategic aspects of advertising, including the development of complex marketing plans, budgeting, and other strategic considerations.
